question: Which country has launched a military communication satellite called Lockheed Martin Advanced Extremely High Frequency (AEHF) satellite?
explanation:
The United States Space Force launched a military communication satellite called Lockheed Martin Advanced Extremely High Frequency (AEHF) satellite.
The satellite was launched aboard an Atlas V551 rocket, from Cape Canaveral in Florida. This is the sixth and final in the Lockheed Martin AEHF constellation. This ultra-secure satellite is launched amid the heavy losses the country is facing due to the coronavirus pandemic.
